message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a valuable product that I think could be a great asset to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15000 for it.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I appreciate your offer, $15000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $18000. This is still a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's make this work!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $16000 for the product.
